cat(
if(file.exists("frontpage.pdf")) "\\includegraphics{frontpage.pdf}\\pagebreak",
"\\pagenumbering{arabic}")

for (i in seq_along(params$title.i)) {
  
  cat("
  \\begin{center}
  {\\fontsize{",params$title.cex[i],"pt}{20pt}\\selectfont\\bf\\vspace{.7cm}", params$title.i[i], "} \\\\
  \\bigskip
  \\vfill
  {\\fontsize{",params$authors.cex[i],"pt}{20pt}\\selectfont\\bf", params$authors.i[i], "} \\\\
  \\bigskip
  \\vfill
  \\begin{itemize}
  {\\fontsize{",params$affiliations.cex[i],"pt}{14pt}\\selectfont
  ", params$affiliations.i[i], "} \\\\
  \\end{itemize}
  \\bigskip
  \\vfill
  \\end{center}
  \\fontsize{",params$text.cex[i],"pt}{20pt}\\selectfont", params$text.i[i], "  \\
  \\vfill
  \\pagebreak
  ")
}
